content: crochet pumpkin leaf pattern by get to hooking crochet abbreviations used materials st = stitch f/o = fasten_off worsted weight yarn in green chain = chain sl = slip_stitch g 4 mm or h 5 mm crochet hook single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet tapestry needle double_crochet = double_crochet tc = triple crochet skill level pattern notes read before starting beginner/intermediate this pattern uses us crochet terms gauge is unimportant watch the video tutorial https //bit ly/4ac469y pumpkin leaf round 1 chain 4 counts as 1 st into the third chain from the hook double_crochet 8 sl into tip if you crochet with a the same chain to join 9 looser gauge you may round 2 consider going down a chain 3 turn counts as 1 st double_crochet into the same st hook size or two for a double_crochet-increase into the next 8 st more polished look sl into the center hole to join 18 round 3 the 18 steps below represent the 18 stitches of the previous round 1 chain 2 turn work 1 half_double_crochet and 3 double_crochet into the same 10 tc 2 double_crochet into the same st st 11 double_crochet half_double_crochet into the same st 2 tc 4 into the same st 12 half_double_crochet 3 half_double_crochet 13 double_crochet 4 into the same st 4 single_crochet 14 half_double_crochet 5 half_double_crochet 15 single_crochet 6 double_crochet 4 into the same st 16 half_double_crochet 7 half_double_crochet 17 tc 4 into the same st 8 half_double_crochet double_crochet into the same st 18 double_crochet 3 half_double_crochet into the same st sl into center hole 9 into the same st double_crochet tc 2 chain 2 and sl into f/o weaving in ends or leaving a long tail second chain from hook to attach to a larger project 1 ©2023
